entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sainte-Foy - Laval University 2:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

Humidity: 44 %
Dewpoint: -6.9°C
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain showers and flurries beginning this evening then changing to flurries at times heavy after midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm except 10 cm over northern sections. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
